nodes.text: This Jedi Temple was erected on Draay 2 by the Jedi Master Lucien Draay during the Mandalorian Wars where the Gauntlet of Kressh the Younger was hidden.

During the Clone Wars, Master B'ink Utrila and her padawan were sent on the moon with a squad of clone troopers in order to find the Sith amulet in the abandoned temple and to prevent the Sith Lord, Count Dooku, from recovering it.
